org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions
Class StorageBroker

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions.StorageBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Auctioneer
public class StorageBroker
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Auctioneer

StorageBroker class is a thread which handles the auctions on behalf of a StorageElement. One of these threads is started for each StorageElement present on a site. It can receive Auction objects coming from other threads, send bids in response to auctions, and start new auctions to try to find a file of which there is not a replica in the local storage.

Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

auctionComplete

public void auctionComplete(Auction thisAuction,
                            StorageBroker winningSB)
Called when this StorageBroker has received the result of its nested auction. This means it can bid in all the auctions that want this file, if its auction found a winner.

fileAvailable in interface Auctioneer
Parameters:
